biocontainers.name: neobio
biocontainers.summary: Neobio is a java class library of computational biology algorithms. the current version consists mainly of pairwise sequence alignment algorithms such as the classical dynamic programming methods of needleman-wunsch and smith-waterman.

biotools.summary: NeoBio is a Java class library of Computational Biology Algorithms. The current version consists mainly of pairwise sequence alignment algorithms such as the classical dynamic programming methods of Needleman-Wunsch and Smith-Waterman.
